content: easy and quick gift for christmas you can use the gnomes as christmas tree ornaments or keychains easy and fast to make you can crochet a bunch of gnomes and gift them to your co-workers or friends perfect for stocking fillers there are 3 gnomes- santa claus grinch and elf materials - 3 5mm crochet hook - light worsted weight or dk weight yarn -poly fiber fill for stuffing - tapestry needle
